examples.description: creates a 'songs' property set to an empty array (genre has many songs)
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Genre: Genre #initialize creates a 'songs' property set to an empty array (genre has many songs)

examples.description: returns the genre's 'songs' collection (genre has many songs)
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Genre: Genre #songs returns the genre's 'songs' collection (genre has many songs)

examples.description: can be invoked with an optional third argument, a Genre object to be assigned to the song's 'genre' property (song belongs to genre)
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Genre: Song #initialize can be invoked with an optional third argument, a Genre object to be assigned to the song's 'genre' property (song belongs to genre)

examples.description: returns the genre of the song (song belongs to genre)
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Genre: Song #genre returns the genre of the song (song belongs to genre)

examples.description: assigns a genre to the song (song belongs to genre)
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Genre: Song #genre= assigns a genre to the song (song belongs to genre)

examples.description: adds the song to the genre's collection of songs (genre has many songs)
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Genre: Song #genre= adds the song to the genre's collection of songs (genre has many songs)

examples.description: does not add the song to the genre's collection of songs if it already exists therein
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Genre: Song #genre= does not add the song to the genre's collection of songs if it already exists therein

examples.description: invokes #genre= instead of simply assigning to a @genre instance variable to ensure that associations are created upon initialization
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Genre: Song #initialize invokes #genre= instead of simply assigning to a @genre instance variable to ensure that associations are created upon initialization
